name: Tanks! (antandrej)
description:
A local multiplayer top down tank shooter

Pick your name and battle your enemy, but be careful, you only have 3 lives.

Player 1 Controls : W A S D - movement, Space Bar - firing

Player 2 Controls : Arrow Keys - movement, Right Control - firing

Assets used for this game:
  • Tank by Quaternius
  • Tank by Quaternius
  • Tree by Marc Solà [CC-BY] via Poly Pizza
  • Military Tent by KolosStudios [CC-BY] via Poly Pizza
  • Generator by KolosStudios [CC-BY] via Poly Pizza
  • Container by KolosStudios [CC-BY] via Poly Pizza
  • Ambulance Car by Zsky [CC-BY] via Poly Pizza
  • Missile by Jarlan Perez [CC-BY] via Poly Pizza
  • Fence by Tomáš Bayer [CC-BY] via Poly Pizza
  • Wall by Quaternius
